page.title: 12THE CHILBRIDGE FARM
page.content:
{CHILBRIDGE FARM}consists of 113 acres farmland wild diciduous woodland, buildings, farm tracks,lanes and hedgerows.The woodland used for private sporting activities{Chilbridge
300 sows grass pig rearing for pork {Old lawn farm} 115,000 Hens poultry rearing farming.Egg production. 2,000,000 Doz/a. { { Kingdown farm Calves {BUILDING EQUIPMENT.}The building equipment consists of lowrise poultry and pig units.8 Barns/Large out buildings.20 cottages 2 Farmhouses. 1 rotary milking parlour drills 2 combines 5 lorries,silage machines, rotary tractors,milling machinery and ground spraying equipment.
